import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const ProductScreen = () => { //const product = products.find((p) => Number(p._id) === Number(props.match.params.id)) let { id } = useParams(); const product = products.find((p) => p._id === id) return ( <>

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: ${product.description} ) } export default ProductScreen
